generalContent.introCopy: Welcome to Code Workshop! Yes, indeed.

projects.projectDescription: Partner portal for existing EE, T-mobile and Orange resellers to access branding and marketing information.

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Sapient is a consulting and technology company with a global headcount of over 7k.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: I was part of a two-man front end team developing a portal site for internal partners. Due to a short deadline, the pages were developed directly from wireframes and styleguides with full GD for only some of the elements, this was sucessfully accomplished by an ongoing consultation and review process with designers and IA's.
otherDetails: Front-end build in HTML5 and CSS3
Login form scripting for clientside validation and querying REST login service
